title: Is there a bug with draft pick?
body: I'm level 25 and have been playing draft pick once it was available for me for days now. I login today and it's grayed out, and when hovering over it it says I must own 16 champions. I never owned 16 champions before and I was able to play. Is this a glitch?

replies.body: It looks like you have Teemo on your account, who is currently disabled per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  While disabled, your champion pool will go down by 1.  I don't have any info or eta on when Teemo will be re-enabled, but you can also unlock another champion in the meantime.  Let me know if that clears things up!

It still doesn't make sense because I only have a total of 6 owned champions... including Teemo. And Teemo has been disabled for a few days now and I have been playing draft mode after his ban. Really strange how I was playing with that mode if that was a prior rule, but it was completely unlocked for me, you can check my match history.

You have 10 champions available through the[ Free Champion Rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/new-free-champion-rotation-akali-lucian-viktor-and-more) which is included as part of your roster.  The free roster updated in the last 24 hours.  That refresh includes Karma who you already have unlocked on your account, so it doesn't count towards your pool.
Ahh that answers that, I didn't know the free champions were included in it. Thanks
